document.full_text: a u.s. court will hear oral arguments on june 8 in a government appeal of a federal judge's ruling that struck down president barack obama's landmark healthcare overhaul law as unconstitutional.
document.title: june date set for healthcare appeal in u.s. court
lines_and_colors: a u.s. court will hear oral arguments on june 8 in a government appeal of a federal judge's ruling that struck down president barack obama's landmark healthcare overhaul law as unconstitutional.
